en.info_benefits_safety: Vaccines are safe and effective tools to protect your child from serious diseases. They work by teaching your body to fight off infections. Scientific studies consistently show their benefits far outweigh any risks. If you have concerns about ingredients, please know that they are present in very small, safe amounts, often less than what you encounter daily in food and water. For more details, consult a healthcare professional.
en.info_side_effects: Most vaccine side effects are mild and temporary, like soreness, redness, or a low-grade fever at the injection site. Serious reactions are extremely rare. These mild reactions show your child's immune system is building protection. If you are worried, please consult your clinic or doctor.
en.info_schedule_explanation: The South African childhood immunization schedule is carefully designed to protect your child at the right time. Vaccines are given at specific ages to ensure maximum effectiveness against common childhood diseases. For example, at birth, your baby receives BCG and OPV. At 6 weeks, they get OPV, RV, DTaP-IPV-Hib-HepB, and PCV. Sister Botina 2.0 can help you track your child's specific schedule.
en.info_misinformation:
There's a lot of false information about vaccines. Here are some common myths debunked:
- MYTH: Vaccines cause autism. FACT: Extensive scientific research has found no link between vaccines and autism.
- MYTH: Vaccines contain harmful toxins. FACT: Vaccine ingredients are safe in the tiny amounts used and are quickly processed by the body.
- MYTH: Natural immunity is better. FACT: While natural immunity exists, getting sick with a disease carries far greater risks (e.g., severe illness, disability, death) than vaccination.
Always rely on trusted sources like the Department of Health or your healthcare provider for vaccine information.
en.schedule_prompt_birthdate: To help Sister Botina 2.0 with your child's vaccination schedule, please provide their birth date in the format YYYY-MM-DD (e.g., 2024-01-15).
en.schedule_confirm_birthdate: Thank you! Your child's birth date is set to %BIRTHDATE%. Sister Botina 2.0 will now provide reminders based on the South African immunization schedule. Remember to bring your Road-to-Health book to all appointments.
en.schedule_upcoming_reminders: Here is your child's full immunization schedule:
en.schedule_no_birthdate: Sister Botina 2.0 doesn't have your child's birth date yet. Please provide it in YYYY-MM-DD format to get reminders and a personalized schedule.
en.schedule_no_upcoming_reminders: There are no upcoming vaccination reminders found based on your child's age. Please check their full schedule below.
en.emotional_support_intro: It's normal to feel worried or have questions about your child's health and vaccinations. Sister Botina 2.0 is a safe space. What's on your mind? You can ask anything, no judgment. Common concerns include vaccine side effects, fear of 'immune overload,' or guilt over missed appointments.
en.emotional_support_side_effects: It's understandable to be concerned about side effects. Remember, most are mild and temporary. Sister Botina 2.0 is here to support you. What specific side effects are you worried about?
en.emotional_support_immune_overload: The idea of 'immune overload' from vaccines is a common concern, but it's not supported by science. Babies are exposed to countless germs daily, and vaccines present a tiny fraction of the immune challenge compared to natural infections. Your baby's immune system is incredibly robust!
en.emotional_support_missed_appointment: It's okay if you've missed an appointment. Life happens! The most important thing is to get back on track. Please contact your clinic as soon as possible to reschedule. They will help you catch up without judgment. Remember to bring your Road-to-Health book.
en.emotional_support_general:
Don't worry, you're a great parent and it's brave to ask for help. Thank you for sharing your concerns. If you want to connect with other parents and share your feelings, we have a community forum on our website: https://sister-botina-companion-app-744.created.app/

af.info_benefits_safety: Entstowwe is veilige en effektiewe hulpmiddels om jou kind teen ernstige siektes te beskerm. Hulle werk deur jou liggaam te leer om infeksies te beveg. Wetenskaplike studies toon konsekwent dat hul voordele enige risiko's ver oorskry. As jy bekommerd is oor bestanddele, weet asseblief dat dit in baie klein, veilige hoeveelhede voorkom, dikwels minder as wat jy daagliks in kos en water te√´kom. Raadpleeg 'n gesondheidswerker vir meer besonderhede.
af.info_side_effects: Die meeste newe-effekte van entstowwe is lig en tydelik, soos seerheid, rooiheid of 'n ligte koors op die inspuitplek. Ernstige reaksies is uiters skaars. Hierdie ligte reaksies toon dat jou kind se immuunstelsel beskerming opbou. As jy bekommerd is, raadpleeg asseblief jou kliniek of dokter.
af.info_schedule_explanation: Die Suid-Afrikaanse kinderimmuniseringskedule is sorgvuldig ontwerp om jou kind op die regte tyd te beskerm. Entstowwe word op spesifieke ouderdomme gegee om maksimum doeltreffendheid teen algemene kindersiektes te verseker. By geboorte ontvang jou baba byvoorbeeld BCG en OPV. Op 6 weke kry hulle OPV, RV, DTaP-IPV-Hib-HepB en PCV. Suster Botina 2.0 kan jou help om jou kind se spesifieke skedule te volg.
af.info_misinformation:
Daar is baie vals inligting oor entstowwe. Hier is 'n paar algemene mites ontmasker:
- MITE: Entstowwe veroorsaak outisme. FEIT: Uitgebreide wetenskaplike navorsing het geen verband tussen entstowwe en outisme gevind nie.
- MITE: Entstowwe bevat skadelike gifstowwe. FEIT: Entstofbestanddele is veilig in die klein hoeveelhede wat gebruik word en word vinnig deur die liggaam verwerk.
- MITE: Natuurlike immuniteit is beter. FEIT: Alhoewel natuurlike immuniteit bestaan, hou siekte met 'n siekte veel groter risiko's in (bv. ernstige siekte, gestremdheid, dood) as inenting.
Vertrou altyd op betroubare bronne soos die Departement van Gesondheid of jou gesondheidsorgverskaffer vir entstofinligting.

zu.info_benefits_safety: Imigomo iphephile futhi iyasebenza ukuvikela ingane yakho ezifweni ezinzima. Isebenza ngokufundisa umzimba wakho ukulwa nezifo. Ucwaningo lwesayensi lubonisa ngokuqhubekayo ukuthi izinzuzo zayo zidlula kakhulu noma yiziphi izingozi. Uma unokukhathazeka mayelana nezithako, sicela wazi ukuthi zikhona ngamanani amancane kakhulu, aphephile, ngokuvamile ngaphansi kwalokho okuhlangana nakho nsuku zonke ekudleni nasemanzini. Ukuze uthole imininingwane eyengeziwe, thintana nochwepheshe bezempilo.
zu.info_side_effects: Imiphumela emibi eminingi yemigomo ilula futhi yesikhashana, njengobuhlungu, ububomvu, noma umkhuhlane omncane endaweni yomjovo. Ukusabela okubi kakhulu kuyivelakancane. Lokhu kusabela okulula kubonisa ukuthi amasosha omzimba wengane yakho akha ukuvikela. Uma ukhathazekile, sicela uthintane nomtholampilo wakho noma udokotela.
zu.info_schedule_explanation: Isheduli yokugoma yezingane yaseNingizimu Afrika yakhelwe ngokucophelela ukuvikela ingane yakho ngesikhathi esifanele. Imigomo inikezwa ngeminyaka ethile ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukusebenza okuphezulu ezifweni ezivamile zezingane. Ngokwesibonelo, lapho izalwa, ingane yakho ithola i-BCG ne-OPV. Ngemva kwamaviki angu-6, ithola i-OPV, i-RV, i-DTaP-IPV-Hib-HepB, ne-PCV. USister Botina 2.0 angakusiza ukuthi ulandele isheduli ethile yengane yakho.
zu.info_misinformation:
Kunolwazi oluningi olungelona iqiniso mayelana nemigomo. Nazi ezinye izinganekwane ezivamile ezichithwe:
- INGANEKWANE: Imigomo ibangela i-autism. IQINISO: Ucwaningo olunzulu lwesayensi alutholanga ukuxhumana phakathi kwemigomo ne-autism.
- INGANEKWANE: Imigomo iqukethe ubuthi obuyingozi. IQINISO: Izithako zemigomo ziphephile ngamanani amancane asetshenzisiwe futhi zicutshungulwa ngokushesha umzimba.
- INGANEKWANE: Amasosha omzimba emvelo angcono. IQINISO: Nakuba amasosha omzimba emvelo ekhona, ukugula ngesifo kunezinkinga ezinkulu kakhulu (isb., ukugula okukhulu, ukukhubazeka, ukufa) kunokugoma.
Ngaso sonke isikhathi thembela emithonjeni ethembekile efana noMnyango Wezempilo noma umhlinzeki wakho wezempilo ukuze uthole ulwazi lokugoma.

xh.info_side_effects: Uninzi lweziphumo ebezingalindelekanga zezithinteli zilula kwaye zezexeshana, njengobuhlungu, ububomvu, okanye umkhuhlane omncinci kwindawo yokutofa. Ukusabela okubi kakhulu kunqabile kakhulu. Olu lusabela oluncinci lubonisa ukuba inkqubo yomzimba womntwana wakho yakha ukhuseleko. Ukuba unexhala, nceda thetha nekliniki yakho okanye ugqirha.
xh.info_schedule_explanation: Ishedyuli yokugonya yabantwana baseMzantsi Afrika yenzelwe ngononophelo ukukhusela umntwana wakho ngexesha elifanelekileyo. Izithinteli zinikwa ngeminyaka ethile ukuqinisekisa ukusebenza okuphezulu ngokuchasene nezifo eziqhelekileyo zabantwana. Ngokomzekelo, ekuzalweni, umntwana wakho ufumana i-BCG ne-OPV. Kwiiveki ezi-6, bafumana i-OPV, i-RV, i-DTaP-IPV-Hib-HepB, kunye ne-PCV. USister Botina 2.0 angakunceda ukuba ulandele ishedyuli ethile yomntwana wakho.
xh.info_misinformation:
Kunolwazi olungachananga oluninzi malunga nezithinteli. Nazi ezinye iintsomi eziqhelekileyo ezichithiweyo:
- INTSOMI: Izithinteli zibangela i-autism. INYANISO: Uphando olunzulu lwesayensi alufumananga nxulumano phakathi kwezithinteli ne-autism.
- INTSOMI: Izithinteli zineetyhefu eziyingozi. INYANISO: Izithako zezithinteli zikhuselekile ngamanani amancinci asetyenzisiweyo kwaye zicutshulwa ngokukhawuleza ngumzimba.
- INTSOMI: Ukukhuseleka komzimba wendalo kungcono. INYANISO: Ngelixa ukukhuseleka komzimba wendalo kukho, ukugula ngesifo kuneengozi ezinkulu kakhulu (umz., isifo esinzima, ukukhubazeka, ukufa) kunokugonya.
Soloko uthembele kwimithombo ethembekileyo efana neSebe Lezempilo okanye umboneleli wakho wezempilo ngolwazi lokugonya.

xh.emotional_support_intro: Kuqhelekile ukuziva ukhathazekile okanye ube nemibuzo malunga nempilo yomntwana wakho kunye nokugonya. USister Botina 2.0 yindawo ekhuselekileyo. Yintoni ekukhathazayo? Ungabuza nantoni na, ngaphandle kokugweba. Inkxalabo eqhelekileyo ibandakanya iziphumo ebezingalindeleka zezithinteli, uloyiko 'lokugcwala komzimba,' okanye ityala malunga nokungahambeli iintlanganiso.
xh.emotional_support_side_effects: Kuyaqondakala ukuba unexhala malunga neziphumo ebezingalindeleka. Khumbula, uninzi zilula kwaye zezexeshana. USister Botina 2.0 ulapha ukuze akuxhase. Zeziphi iziphumo ebezingalindeleka ezithile ezikukhathazayo?
xh.emotional_support_immune_overload: Ingcamango 'yokugcwala komzimba' kwizithinteli yinkxalabo eqhelekileyo, kodwa ayixhaswa yisayensi. Iintsana zivezwe kwiintsholongwane ezingenakubalwa yonke imihla, kwaye izithinteli zibonisa inxalenye encinci kakhulu yomceli mngeni wokukhusela umzimba xa kuthelekiswa nezifo zendalo. Inkqubo yomzimba womntwana wakho yomelele kakhulu!
xh.emotional_support_missed_appointment: Kulungile ukuba uphoswe yintlanganiso. Ubomi buyaqhubeka! Okona kubalulekileyo kukubuyela endleleni. Nceda uqhagamshelane nekliniki yakho ngokukhawuleza ukuze uhlele kwakhona. Baza kukunceda ukuba ubambe ngaphandle kokugweba. Nceda zisa incwadi yakho ye-Road-to-Health.
